paper.title: Using software quality characteristics to measure business process quality

author.org: (Informatics Institute, Middle East Technical University, Ankara, Turkey)
(Informatics Institute, Middle East Technical University, Ankara, Turkey)

paper.abstract: Organizations frequently use product based organizational perf-ormance models to measure the effects of information system (IS) on their organizations. This paper introduces a complementary process based approach that is founded on measuring business process quality attributes. These quality attributes are defined on the basis of ISO/IEC 9126 Software Product Quality Model. The new process quality attributes are applied in an experiment and results are discussed in the paper.
